summary: For people who love the Sofia Follower mod but prefer a different appearance
descriptionHtml:
(Sorry, English is not my native language)

For people who love the Sofia Follower mod but prefer a different appearance

Body: UN7B
Skin: 4k skin textures (make sure ur computer can handle this)

Load Order:
1. Sofia Follower [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]here[/url]
2. My mod

[b][u]Uninstall:[/u][/b]
Deactive my file on MO or NMW or both

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
John Jarvis – Creator, writer, developer, scripting.
Christine Slagman (finalCrystine) – Voice of Sofia, audio editing, additional writing, beta testing and additional help.

My other mod:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85244/?]Dayeon Follower Replacer[/url]
author: infinitywolf1
